question: Which bank had recently received the “Best Performing Bank Award”?
explanation: The Union Minister of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare, Rural Development and Panchayati Raj had recently awarded the “Best Performing Bank Award” to the Andhra Bank for the financial year 2018-19. It was awarded for setting up 14 Rural Self Employment Training Institutes (RSETIs) in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Odisha and Kerala. The RSETIs function under the Andhra Bank Rural Development Trust.
